text: Edward Watson (27 October 1901 – 1986) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1901 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Sunderland, Tyne and Wear Category:Footballers from Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Sunderland West End F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Queens Park Rangers F.C. players Category:Rochdale A.F.C. players Category:Carlisle United F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Date of death missing
title: Edward Watson (footballer)
